file.name: adminaccounts.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: '@viron/lib admin account'
  description: admin user account api specifications
  x-pages:
    - id: vironAdminAccount
      group: 管理画面/管理
      title: Viron アカウント設定
      description: アカウント設定を閲覧できます
      contents:
        - operationId: listVironAdminAccounts
          resourceId: vironAdminAccount
          type: table
          pagination: true

tags:
  - name: vironAdminAccounts

paths:
  /viron/adminaccounts:
    get:
      operationId: listVironAdminAccounts
      tags:
        - vironAdminAccount
      summary: list admin account
      description: 管理ユーザーアカウント
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './adminusers.yaml#/components/schemas/VironAdminUserListWithPager'
      security:
        - jwt: []

  /viron/adminaccounts/{id}:
    put:
      operationId: updateVironAdminAccount
      tags:
        - vironAdminAccount
      summary: update an admin account
      description: 管理ユーザーのアカウント情報を更新する
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironIdPathParam'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminAccountUpdatePayload'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []

components:
  schemas:
    VironAdminAccountUpdatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        password:
          description: パスワード
          type: string
          format: password
          pattern: "^.*?[a-zA-Z\\d!?#$%&@*+/-_<=>]{8,}"
      required:
        - password

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /viron/adminaccounts: get: operation "listVironAdminAccounts": responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: resolve "./adminusers.yaml#/components/schemas/VironAdminUserListWithPager": external "./adminusers.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
